mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP_PRODUCT_OPTION (PRDT_CODE, PRDT_COLOR_CODE, PRDT_SIZE, PRDT_LAVE_COUNT, RGS_ID, REGT_DTM, COLOR_NAME, OPTION_SEQ) values (#{prdtCode},#{prdtColorCode},#{prdtSize},#{prdtLaveCount},#{rgsId},SYSDATE,#{colorName},OPTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
